metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3172 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in tree.php in Cacti 0.8.8g and earlier allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the parent_id parameter in an item_edit action.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
